mapper.select: SELECT p.program_no as programNo, p.program_name as programName, p.program_max_customer as maxCustomer, d.program_date_no as programDateNo, d.program_date as programDate, IFNULL(r.cnt, 0) as cntCustomer FROM program_date d LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT program_date_no, count(*) as 'cnt' FROM program_reservation GROUP BY program_date_no ) r ON d.program_date_no = r.program_date_no INNER JOIN program p ON d.program_no = p.program_no p.program_no = #{ program_no };
